page.title: 10A girl from Rocester.
page.content: My name is Lisa and I live in a new semi-detached house in Rocester.I rise at 7.30am.,my dad has already gone to work at J.C.B. Mum prepares breakfast and then goes to school where she works as a cook.My brother cannot find a job so he stays in bed while I prepare for school.I attend Ryecroft Middle School from 9am.to 3.40pm.I have 1 hour to eat my dinner and play but the rest is hard work. I am glad when school ends and I can go home. I change out of my uniform, have my tea which is usually sandwiches and then go out to play.It is now the summer so sometimes we play rounders and go on the children's playground.We play a chasing game called tick.When I come in at 8.30pm.I watch T.V. or I listen to pop music on my music centre and then at 9.00pm.I go to bed in my own room.
